frameset.edef: to drift, to be carried away, to be driven

example.parse: VP (X (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أَصْبَح) (PVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-PRD (PREP كَ) (NP (DET+NOUN العَبِيد))) (S (S (VP (IV1P+IV_PASS نِنساق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG كِلْمَة))))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (IV1P+IV_PASS نِتفَرّق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NOUN عَصا))))))))
